Direct-To | June 2017 <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/service-listing/cabin-connectivity]]> Inside the FMS <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2017/FMSJun17]]>
ATC Log Message Retention Logic on G450/G550
In response to recent questions from pilots, Honeywell Engineering takes a detailed look at ATC Log Management logic... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2017/FMSJun17]]>
GoDirect Flight Sentinel Briefing <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2017/GDEDCTJun17]]> When an ATC Delay Becomes an EDCT
EDCTs tell air traffic controllers and flight crews when they can expect to depart to an affected airport... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2017/GDEDCTJun17]]> FMS 6.1 June Highlights <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2017/FMS61Jun17]]> Leg Combinations / MAGVAR Tables
Learn about improved leg combinations and updated magnetic variation tables in this month's edition of NZ 6.1 Highlights... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2017/FMS61Jun17]]>
FANS Datalink Update <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2017/DatacomJun17]]> U.S. Data Comm National Single Logon ID
The FAA Data Comm Program is preparing to transition to a single ID for CPDLC logons later this year... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2017/DatacomJun17]]>
Honeywell Mobile Apps <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2017/WISJun17]]>
Pilot Gives “Thumbs Up” to Honeywell Weather App
ABS Jets was an early adopter of the breakthrough Weather Information Service app, which gives pilots access to real-time weather information – including turbulence forecasts – on their electronic flight bag.... Read more <[[https://performanceaccel.honeywell.com/Pilots/Newsletters/2016/June2017/WISJun17]]>
